name: Mog Opreating System
short_description:
MogOS Project is an 32-bit opreating System
This Project to develop a fully distributed OS written In C/C++/Assembly
Designed from scratch By Systems Developer named MohamedIBrahim in field of 
Systems and Opreating System Development

What is MogOS ? MogOS is an operating system. It is free and open source. It is released under GNU General Public License (GPL). To view the GNU GPL click here or visit www.gnu.org. Ace OS is still under development and the development is more focusing on the Kernel concepts. Mog-OS is developed from a scratch none of its module is copied from Linux or any other OS.

Usage: MogOS is developed for Learning and As reasearch In field In Systems . You can use MogOS to study Operating System and Kernel Papers, because it is small and may be simple. Or you can use MogOS for any purpose by modifing the source code And Made EveryThing What You Want.

Development: MogOS Kernel modules are developed by absorbing the interesting, easy, effective
